alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Southern Jasper (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 5:18PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL HARDIN AND SOUTHEASTERN JASPER COUNTIES THROUGH 545 PM CST... At 517 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Silsbee, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vegetation and outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lumberton, Silsbee, Buna, and Evadale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
